Html.content: With OpenCms version 8.5 there is a new document type called xmlcontent-solr. Its implementation (CmsSolrDocumentXmlContent) performs a localized content extraction that is used later on to fill the Solr input document. As explained in the section about custom fields for XML content, it is possible to define a mapping between elements defined in the XSD of an XML resource type and a field of the Solr document. The values for those defined XSD field mappings are also extracted by the document type named xmlcontent-solr.
